ref: 8264 *putta2 ʻ insect ʼ, puttikā -- f. ʻ white ant ʼ Mn. (San- skritized as putra -- 2 m. ʻ small animal ʼ Car., putraka -- 2 m. ʻ id. ʼ Suśr., ʻ grasshopper ʼ lex.). 2. *puttala -- 2, puttalikā -- 2 f. ʻ fly ʼ Yaśast.com. [Like (pipīlika -- )puṭa -- n. ʻ anthill ʼ MBh., ← Drav. T. Burrow TPS 1945, 111, EWA ii 304 (Tam. puṛṛu, Kan. puttu, Tel. puṭṭa, Prj. putkal ʻ white ant hill ʼ: DED 3556)]
Ku. dhan -- putā ʻ winged ants ʼ;
N. putko ʻ a kind of small bee ʼ.
